FuncDef:
The loop-detect trigger min-slot-uptime command configures the minimum startup time for the interface boards.
The undo loop-detect trigger min-slot-uptime command restores the default minimum time for enabling the interface boards.
By default, the minimum time for enabling an interface board is 30 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the minimum time for enabling an interface board.
The value ranges from 1 to 100, in seconds. The default value is 30 minutes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the minimum startup time for enabling the interface board, run the loop-detect trigger min-slot-uptime command. The minimum time is the threshold for proactive loop detection upon interface Up. The proactive loop detection upon interface Up function takes effect only when the interface Down time exceeds the threshold.
